mapper.select: WITH memberAge AS ( SELECT m1.userId, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, birth)/12) age FROM member1 m1 JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId WHERE userLevel > 0 AND userLevel < 50 ) SELECT '10대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age >= 10 AND age < 20 UNION ALL SELECT '20대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age >= 20 AND age < 30 UNION ALL SELECT '30대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age >= 30 AND age < 40 UNION ALL SELECT '40대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age >= 40 AND age < 50 UNION ALL SELECT '50대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age >= 50 AND age < 60 UNION ALL SELECT '60대' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age >= 60 AND age < 70 UNION ALL SELECT '기타' section, COUNT(*) count FROM memberAge WHERE age < 10 OR age >= 70
